Builder Info: Anant Raj Group is a leading real estate company that is based in Delhi-NCR. The Group has several foreign investors, including the Government of Singapore Investment Corporation. The Group has also entered into a tie-up with Reliance ADAG for infrastructure and hospitality projects. Morgan Stanley and the George Soros Group have also invested in the Group.
